text.textblock: Westslope Timber Sale, Plumas National Forest; Environmental Impact Statement Cancellation
The Plumas National Forest is no longer involved in the preparation of an Environmental Impact Statement for the Westslope Timber Sale.
The notice of Intent, published in the
on March 5, 1991, is hereby rescinded (56 FR 9194).

further.textblock: R.C. Bennett, Environmental Coordinator, Plumas National Forest, Box 11500, Quincy, CA 95971, telephone (916) 283-2050.
